data_collection package

Submodules

data_collection.data_collection module

data_collection.py

Runs the simulation multiple times and finds the maximum positron yield variation with a specified independent variable.

Timothy Chew 1/8/25

data_collection.data_collection.run_data_collection(variables: list, variable_name: str, variable_parameter_name: str, units: str, old_value: float, xray_type: float, repeat: int = 3, additional_label: str = None, sim_params: dict = {'bath vis': False, 'fwhm': 11.99169832, 'off axis dist': 1, 'pulse height': 3.1, 'pulse length': 0.0135, 'rotation': 0.6981317007977318, 'x pos': -11.99169832}, sample_params: dict = {'angle samples': 400, 'azimuthal samples': 50, 'delay samples': 100, 'samples per angle': 20})[source]

Automatic data collection script Loops simulation to observe changes to a defined variable

Args:

variables (list[float]): variable values variable_name (str): name of the variable being varied variable_parameter_name (str): specific parameter name of the variable units (str): units of the variable old_value (float): value of the variable in the 2018 experiment xray_type (float): type of xray source used repeat (int, optional): number of times to repeat the simulation. Defaults to 3. additional_label (str, optional): additional labels on the

directory to store the data. Defaults to None.

sim_params (dict, optional): simulation parameters (e.g.: fwhm, rotation).

Defaults to accurate.

sample_params (dict, optional): sampling parameters (e.g.: n_samples).

Defaults to deep.

Raises:

KeyError: if variable_parameter_name isn’t a valid parameter name

data_collection.data_collection.run_hit_counter_var(var: dict, params: dict = {'bath vis': False, 'fwhm': 11.99169832, 'off axis dist': 1, 'pulse height': 3.1, 'pulse length': 0.0135, 'rotation': 0.6981317007977318, 'x pos': -11.99169832}, sampling: dict = {'angle samples': 400, 'azimuthal samples': 50, 'delay samples': 100, 'samples per angle': 20}, xray_type: str = 'uniform')[source]

Runs hit counter while changing variable var

Args:

var (dict): variable to vary {‘name’: float} params (dict): parameters of experiment. Defaults to accurate. sampling (dict): sampling parameters. Defaults to deep. xray_type (str, optional): Type of xray source use e.g. ‘lambertian’. Defaults to ‘uniform’.

Raises:

ValueError: When calling for an unsupported Xray source type

data_collection.data_params module

dataparams.py

Contains dict objects for ideal data collection parameters.

Timothy Chew 1/8/25

data_collection.delay_optimise_collection module

Module to collect optimising delay data

Timothy Chew 6/8/25

data_collection.delay_optimise_collection.run_hit_counter(params: dict = {'bath vis': False, 'fwhm': 11.99169832, 'off axis dist': 1, 'pulse height': 3.1, 'pulse length': 0.0135, 'rotation': 0.6981317007977318, 'x pos': -11.99169832}, sampling: dict = {'angle samples': 400, 'azimuthal samples': 50, 'delay samples': 100, 'samples per angle': 20}, xray_type: str = 'uniform', spectra_type: str = 'default')[source]

Runs hit counter while changing variable var

Args:

var (dict): variable to vary {‘name’: float} params (dict): parameters of experiment. Defaults to accurate. sampling (dict): sampling parameters. Defaults to deep. xray_type (str, optional): Type of xray source use e.g. ‘lambertian’. Defaults to ‘uniform’.

Raises:

ValueError: When calling for an unsupported Xray source type

data_collection.delay_optimise_collection.run_optimise_delay(dir_name: str, xray_type: float, spectra_type: float, repeat: int = 3, sim_params: dict = {'bath vis': False, 'fwhm': 11.99169832, 'off axis dist': 1, 'pulse height': 3.1, 'pulse length': 0.0135, 'rotation': 0.6981317007977318, 'x pos': -11.99169832}, sample_params: dict = {'angle samples': 400, 'azimuthal samples': 50, 'delay samples': 100, 'samples per angle': 20})[source]
